name: Pink Romance
description: A romantic bouquet dominated by pink hues, featuring fresh pink lilies and elegant filler flowers, perfect for expressing sweet affection.

name: Tropical Romance Mini Orchid Garden
description: A charming mini garden arrangement with delicate orchids, bringing a touch of tropical romance and lasting beauty to any space.

name: Southern Peach Bouquet
description: An artful and fresh bouquet combining peach tones with classic romantic blooms, evoking warmth and Southern charm.

name: Special Moments Bouquet
description: A regal arrangement where deep purple roses mingle with soft pink and white blooms, perfect for celebrating life's special moments.

name: Storybook Garden
description: A garden-style bouquet featuring peach roses and vibrant purple alstroemeria, reminiscent of a whimsical storybook scene.

name: Love Medley Bouquet
description: A passionate medley of velvety red roses harmonizing with blushing pink accents, symbolizing deep love and admiration.

name: Pink Rose Succulent Gardenia
description: A unique blend of delicate pink mini roses, charming alstroemeria, and lush succulents in a garden-inspired arrangement.

name: Love-Struck Crimson Bouquet
description: A bold and dramatic bouquet of crimson red roses, whispering timeless devotion and intense, love-struck passion.

name: Gorgeous Glimmer Bouquet
description: Scarlet roses and pristine white lilies come together, creating a glimmering and gorgeous display that ignites like first love.

name: Two Dozen Red & Pink Roses
description: A classic yet vibrant twist on the traditional rose bouquet, featuring two dozen stunning red and pink roses combined.

name: Gardens of Versailles
description: Inspired by opulent French gardens, this arrangement features creamy ivory roses mingling with blushing spray blooms for a regal touch.

name: Packet for You
description: A delightful packet of joy, featuring a cheerful mix of red roses, pink roses, and complementary blooms, perfect for gifting.

name: Cupids Arrangement
description: Crafted for romance, this arrangement combines red and pink blooms as if sent by Cupid himself, ideal for expressing heartfelt love.

name: Just For Your Love
description: A pure and elegant expression of love, featuring one dozen pristine white roses, symbolizing eternal and devoted affection.

name: Dozen Balloons & Teddy Bear
description: A delightful gift set combining a dozen cheerful balloons with a cuddly plush teddy bear, perfect for birthdays or celebrations.

name: Passionate Peaches
description: A warm and inviting bouquet bursting with peach roses and pink accents, embodying passion and cheerful warmth.

name: Daisy & Rose Delight
description: A cheerful and delightful mix of playful daisies and classic pink roses, bringing joy and a lighthearted feeling.

name: Lush Lavender Bouquet
description: A lush and fragrant bouquet in soothing lavender and cream tones, featuring elegant roses and stock for a touch of grace.

name: Country Blossoms
description: A charming country-style arrangement combining hardy succulents with soft pink blooms, evoking a rustic garden feel.

name: Pink Rose Succulent Garden
description: An exquisite and long-lasting garden arrangement featuring pink mini roses nestled among various succulents and pink accents.

name: Stunning Lily Vase
description: A stunning vase arrangement dominated by ten fragrant and beautiful lilies, creating a bold and elegant centerpiece.

name: One Dozen Wild Confetti Roses
description: A playful and vibrant dozen of cream roses accented with colorful 'confetti' like details, symbolizing celebration and joy.

name: Ma Chere Rose
description: 'My Dear Rose' – A classic and tender bouquet of pink roses, expressing sweet, cherished affection for someone special.

name: Purple Pastel Glitter Roses
description: A dozen dyed purple roses dusted with delicate glitter, offering a magical, pastel-hued and sparkling gift.

name: One Dozen Blushing Lavender Roses
description: A dozen beautiful roses in a blushing lavender dye, representing enchantment, love at first sight, and unique beauty.

name: One Dozen Pop of Pink Roses
description: A vibrant dozen roses with a bright 'pop' of pink tint, full of energy, gratitude, and admiring affection.

name: One Dozen Royal Roses
description: A dozen roses tinted in deep, royal purple, symbolizing majesty, admiration, and accomplishment for someone revered.

name: 50 Stunning Long Stemmed Red Roses
description: The ultimate grand gesture – 50 long-stemmed red roses representing profound, enduring love and deep passion.

name: Pinkn Pretty Vase Arrangement
description: A pretty in pink vase arrangement featuring soft pink roses and carnations, offering simple, sweet, and cheerful beauty.

name: New Sense
description: A modern and sophisticated arrangement with green cymbidium orchids and purple accents, evoking a fresh, new sense of style.

name: Whimsical Pink Delight
description: A lighthearted and delightful bouquet of pink tulips and asters, bringing whimsical charm and springtime joy.

name: Gin & Treats Hamper For Her
description: A luxurious gift hamper for her, featuring premium gin and delicious treats, perfect for a sophisticated celebration or pampering.

name: How Sweet Sweet It Is
description: A bright and sweet bouquet designed to brighten any day, filled with joyful colors and a touch of delightful sweetness.

name: You Are My Heart
description: Let your heart speak with this breathtaking, rich arrangement of red and pink blooms, declaring 'You are my heart'.

name: Cherry Blossom Bouquet
description: Embrace the fleeting beauty of spring with this bouquet inspired by cherry blossoms, featuring soft pinks and lush greenery.

name: Blissfully Yours Arrangement
description: Passionate red roses take center stage, blended with complementary blooms to create an arrangement that whispers 'blissfully yours'.

name: Passionate Peaches Pinkies
description: Warm peach roses blend seamlessly with blushing pink accents, creating a passionate and harmoniously colorful display.

name: Raspberry Sorbet Bouquet
description: A vibrant and refreshing mix reminiscent of raspberry sorbet, featuring coral and hot pink gerbera daisies for a playful zest.

name: Hold My Heart Bouquet
description: Blushing pink lilies and soft roses are nestled together in an arrangement that tenderly says 'you hold my heart'.

name: Sweeter Than Ever Bouquet
description: Beckoning with sunlit grace, this bouquet combines soft pastels and delicate textures to create something sweeter than ever.

name: Mermaids Dream Bouquet
description: A vibrant and dreamy bouquet with aquatic blue and purple tones, inspired by the mystical and beautiful depths of a mermaid's dream.

name: Pink and Lavender Harmony
description: An exquisite display of harmonious colors, where soft pink and serene lavender blooms intertwine to send love and grace.

name: Scenic Route Bouquet
description: Reminiscent of a scenic drive through the countryside, this bouquet features wild, textured blooms in natural, soothing colors.

name: Cherry Tart Bouquet
description: Like a freshly baked dessert, this bouquet combines rich red and pink blooms with a delightful fragrance that is simply irresistible.

name: Sweet and Pretty Bouquet
description: The true beauty of this bouquet lies in its simple, sweet, and pretty composition of gentle pastels and classic flowers.

name: Youre Precious Bouquet
description: Blushing shades of pink blooms are nestled together to convey the heartfelt message: 'You are precious to me'.

name: Springtime Spritz Bouquet
description: Lush stock and fresh roses come together, forming a bouquet that feels as refreshing and bubbly as a springtime spritz cocktail.

name: Truly Stunning Bouquet
description: A dreamy, jewel-toned bouquet that combines bold colors with delicate textures, resulting in a truly stunning visual masterpiece.

name: Classic Romance Red Roses - One Dozen
description: A timeless expression of love, featuring one dozen deep crimson roses artfully arranged with elegant foliage for a classic romantic gesture.

name: Classic Romance Red Roses - 18 Roses
description: Eighteen velvety red roses make a bolder, more lavish statement of true love and deep admiration in this classic romantic arrangement.

name: Classic Romance Red Roses - Two Dozen
description: The epitome of romance, featuring two dozen meticulously arranged long-stemmed red roses to convey a message of complete devotion.

name: Luxury Red Roses - 18 Roses
description: Eighteen luxury red roses blaze with unspoken passion, hand-selected for their premium quality and arranged for maximum opulence.

name: Luxury Red Roses - One Dozen
description: Twelve lush, premium red roses, accented with delicate Monte Casino aster, create a luxurious and sophisticated symbol of deep affection.

name: Luxury Red Roses - Two Dozen
description: A grand and sumptuous display of twenty-four luxury red roses that commands attention and signifies a love that is both profound and enduring.

name: Classic Love Red Rose Bouquet 12
description: Our ode to timeless romance, this classic bouquet of 12 red roses is the perfect, unwavering symbol of true and passionate love.

name: Classic Love Red Rose Bouquet 24
description: Double the passion. This magnificent bouquet of 24 red roses amplifies the classic symbol of love for an unforgettable, grand romantic gesture.

name: Luxury Two Dozen Red Roses
description: Two dozen pristine red roses are expertly arranged with white Monte Casino aster for a luxurious, clean, and profoundly elegant presentation.

name: Two Dozen Purple Roses
description: A regal and enchanting gift of two dozen rich purple roses, symbolizing enchantment, majesty, and love at first sight in a beautiful vase.

name: Premium Red Roses
description: The ultimate premium offering: three dozen (36) exquisite red roses representing overflowing love, admiration, and a commitment that is truly grand.

name: 50 Stunning Long Stemmed Red Roses
description: An awe-inspiring declaration of love. Fifty stunning long-stemmed red roses create an unforgettable spectacle of romance and deep devotion.

name: Glorious Pink Roses One Dozen
description: Twelve plush, carefully selected pink roses radiate grace, admiration, and joyful affection in this gloriously soft and feminine arrangement.

name: Sunlit Fall Rose Bouquet (12)
description: Turn up the warmth with this bouquet's sunlit hues of peach, coral, and blush roses, evoking the cozy and vibrant feeling of a fall sunset.

name: Sunlit Fall Rose Bouquet (24)
description: A more abundant version of our fall favorite, with 24 roses in warm, sunlit tones to create a truly breathtaking and seasonally inspired display.

name: Long Stem Red Roses 12
description: You can never go wrong with a hand-tied bouquet of 12 classic long-stemmed red roses, the perfect and reliable symbol of elegant romance.

name: Long Stem Red Roses 24
description: Double the elegance and impact. Twenty-four hand-tied long-stemmed red roses make an exceptionally luxurious and traditional statement of love.

name: Picture Perfect Pink Rose Bouquet 12
description: The picture-perfect petals of 12 pink roses unfold in a bouquet designed to express gentle admiration, sweetness, and perfect happiness.

name: Picture Perfect Pink Rose Bouquet 24
description: An amplified vision of delight. Twenty-four picture-perfect pink roses create a stunningly soft and joyful display of affection and gratitude.

name: Ever After Rose Bouquet 12
description: Live happily ever after with this bouquet of 12 romantic roses in timeless red, symbolizing a love story that is meant to last forever.

name: Ever After Rose Bouquet 24
description: A fairy-tale gesture of love. Twenty-four classic red roses in the 'Ever After' bouquet represent a grand, enduring, and storybook romance.

name: Secret Admirer Lavender Rose Bouquet 12
description: Whisper a message of enchantment and love at first sight with this mysterious and beautiful bouquet of 12 lavender roses from a secret admirer.

name: Secret Admirer Lavender Rose Bouquet 24
description: A bolder, more lavish confession. Twenty-four enchanting lavender roses make an unforgettable statement of mystical admiration and captivating love.

name: Fifty Long Stem Red Roses
description: A forever favorite on a grand scale. Fifty long-stemmed red roses are sure to make a lasting impression of unconditional, overflowing love.

name: Three Dozen Long Stem Red Roses
description: Timeless, classic, and iconic. Three dozen (36) long-stemmed red roses offer a truly generous and traditional symbol of profound love and celebration.

name: A Dozen Long Stemmed Red Roses
description: A timeless classic: one dozen long-stemmed red roses, beautifully presented to show the depth of your love and make a heartfelt impression.

name: 50 Stunning Long Stemmed Red Roses
description: An extravagant declaration of love. Fifty stunning long-stemmed red roses create a breathtaking display of passion, luxury, and unwavering devotion.

name: Fifty Long Stem Red Roses
description: A forever favorite on a magnificent scale. Fifty long-stem red roses are a grand, unforgettable gesture sure to make a lasting statement of eternal love.

name: One Dozen Pink Roses
description: A delicate bouquet of twelve light pink roses, symbolizing grace, sweetness, and admiration—a perfect gift for expressing gentle affection and joy.

name: One Dozen White Roses
description: Twelve pure white roses representing innocence, new beginnings, and eternal loyalty. An elegant and timeless choice for weddings, sympathy, or heartfelt respect.

name: Purple Pastel Glitter Roses
description: A dozen dyed purple roses delicately dusted with glitter, creating a magical, fairy-tale bouquet that symbolizes enchantment and whimsical charm.

name: One Dozen Blushing Lavender Roses
description: Twelve roses in a soft, blushing lavender hue, evoking feelings of love at first sight, fascination, and mystical beauty in a uniquely romantic presentation.

name: One Dozen Pop of Pink Roses
description: A vibrant dozen roses with a bright pop of pink tint, radiating energy, gratitude, and cheerful admiration—ideal for celebrating happy moments and appreciation.

name: One Dozen Royal Roses
description: Twelve majestic purple-tinted roses that embody royalty, admiration, and accomplishment. A regal gift for someone you hold in the highest esteem.
